entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening with showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
